title: League Themed Wedding, LF Reds to reply!
body:
So, my boyfriend and I first met each other on league of legends maybe two years ago. We started to frequently duo or team together, always playing {{champion:222}}  and {{champion:412}} bot lane. Since meeting, we've had promise rings with "duo queued" inscribed inside of them to honor our meeting place.

Now we've advanced to the next level. We're looking at engagement rings, but I've always imagined our wedding to be League themed with the cute figurines as our wedding cake toppers, etc. I'd like to see if there was a Riot employee who could preform our marriage, but support can't help. They said only the boards can!

So here we are, please upvote to get Riot's attention!!! I think it'd be really fitting to be married by a Riot employee after dedicating so much time and relationship to this game!!

Edit: Gotta get Phreak's attention :) I did tweet at him with this board post link, would love if others helped get him to see this post!!!!

Love APoet <3

EDIT: As per request, here are my Duo Queue ring pictures :)

http://imgur.com/2Ddo8Nv

http://imgur.com/KCAKpim

Someone had tweeted out to me asking about this. Unfortunately, I'm elbows deep in my own wedding planning (getting married in September!), so I won't be able to help out with this. D: (Sorry!)

However, I would be happy to help out with suggestions, as our wedding also has some League of Legends accents - such as naming the tables after our favorite champions - and I'm sitting at the Nexus! Oh, and the family we're not too fond of is sitting as Teemo. ;)

Lemme know if you would like to chat about ideas, I'm totally down! Best of luck with your planning! <3

That would be awesome for sure! It's more than fine if you can't help, I"m just looking for if any Rioter is authorized to marry someone, because it'd just be the cherry on top of the cake if it was Riot certified, if you get what I mean ;P

Ps, I'm considering making small replicas of a tower, one red side and one blue, as possible side decorations for either at the alter or reception! And thinking possible thresh lantern replicas with green flowers for the spooky glow, or jinx chompers as centerpieces for tables :)

Good luck on your wedding, especially as it's soon coming! So exciting to see how this game can inspire <3

Those decorations would be killer! For our centerpieces, since the tables are named after champions, the flowers in the center have accents of the champion. So, Teemo has a Teemo shroom in the center, Lux has her staff, Morgana has her shield, etc. Depending on your colors, Thresh lanterns could be awesome - you could even base them off a skin if the base doesn't match your color scheme. ;) Wards may also make sweet centerpieces (that was originally my idea).

I'm also contemplating walking up the aisle to Quinn & Valor's theme. We have a ton of awesome music that you may consider incorporating as well! 

Our vows have 'never one without the other' included, too, haha. 

And thanks! Planning is the best part - honestly, have fun with it! <3

Maybe Taric's old warhammer too :D Are you doing anything fun with your cake?

As for music, I'm not entirely sure just yet. I considered League music but I wouldn't know which song just yet, so that's to be decided!

> That's super cute and totally sounds similar to something I'd do, but I haven't quite decided on vows just yet either. I hit the planning stage early to try to make sure I could get a Rioter to ordain and all haha. These are brilliant ideas though.

Definitely start early - pick all of your wedding vendors ASAP so you get what you want. I highly suggest theknot.com for planning - they suggest all kinds of vendors, and show you the top rated/ones that have won awards. They also offer a killer wedding checklist. ^-^ 

> It really is, I hope to see pictures of your wedding when it happens as well, for more inspiration :)
